We believe empowered and confident girls are girls who can make the difference. It is quite sad that a large number of our girls are affected by issues that arise from lack of confidence in themselves stemming from body issues.

We at Fit Girl believe that all of us are beautiful, and that that message should be spread all over. The main aim of this app here is to simply boost the confidence of girls by letting them know they are beautiful, where they stand in terms of BMI and give them relevant information that helps boost their confidence and care about their health in the best way they can.
We do hope you greatly benefit from the information provided :)

As a young girl in Kenya, you are entitled to the following rights: -Protection form harmful cultural rites. No child should be subjected to female circumcision, early marriage or other cultural rites, customs or traditional practices that are likely to negatively affect the childâ€™s life, health, social welfare, dignity or physical or psychological development. -Right to parental care.Every child has the right to live with and be cared for by his/her parents. - Right to Education.Every child is entitled to free and compulsory primary education the provision of which shall be the responsibility of the Government and the parents.

Empowered girls dramatically improve the wellbeing of their families, their society. Educated women are respected in most of the societies they come from. Hence education gives dignity and honor. Educated women will be a source of inspiration to many young girls as they will be perceived as role models Learning to read and write changes lives ,it means jobs,money ,health and dreams are fullfilled!! The education and empowerment of women throughout the world cannot fail to result in a more caring, tolerant, just and peaceful life for all
